title: Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, Pair up to 100 Speakers,IPX7 Waterproof Speaker Wireless Bluetooth-V5.3, HiFi Stereo Sound, 1100mins Playtime, Portable Speaker for Home, Outdoor, Party
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Raymate Bluetooth Speakers

**Pairing Capability:** Experience the power of sound with our Raymate Bluetooth Speakers that can be paired up to 100 speakers. This feature allows you to create an immersive audio experience for any occasion.

**Waterproof Rating:** With an IPX7 waterproof rating, these speakers are built to withstand the elements. Whether it's rain, snow, or splashes, the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers are designed to endure.

**Bluetooth Version:** Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 version, these speakers ensure a seamless connection with your devices, providing a stable and uninterrupted audio transmission.

**Sound Quality:** The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers deliver HiFi Stereo Sound, offering a rich and detailed audio experience that is sure to impress even the most discerning audiophiles.

**Playtime:** With a playtime of up to 1100 minutes (more than 18 hours), you can enjoy your favorite tunes all day long without worrying about running out of battery.

**Portability:** The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers are designed with portability in mind. Their compact size and lightweight build make them easy to carry wherever you go.

**Suitable Environments:** Whether you're at home, outdoors, or at a party, these speakers are versatile enough to adapt to any environment, providing high-quality sound wherever you are.

**Unique Design Feature:** The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers feature an Integrated Turntable button, providing easier control over your music. This unique design element adds a touch of sophistication to the speakers.

**Audio Technology:** Powered by dual speaker drivers and a powerful amplifier module, these speakers deliver a robust and balanced sound without distortion.

**Design:** The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers boast a golden ratio cylindrical body with pure colors, making them a stylish addition to any space.

**Battery Capacity:** With a 3600mAh battery capacity, these speakers offer more than 15 hours of playtime, ensuring your music keeps going as long as you do.

**Charging Port:** The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers come with a Type C charging port for easy and convenient charging.

Experience superior sound quality and unparalleled convenience with the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers. Order yours today!
